title: 5G/4G RF Firmware Verification and Integration Engineer
summary: As part of an extraordinary modem team, you’ll craft sophisticated, innovative embedded firmware that delivers more performance in our products than ever. You’ll work across fields to transform improved hardware elements into a single, integrated design. Join us, and you’ll help us innovate new wireless systems technologies that continually outperform the previous iterations. By collaborating with other product development groups across Apple, you’ll push the industry boundaries of what wireless systems can do and improve the product experience for our customers worldwide! As a Wireless RF Firmware Validation Engineer on the physical layer and RF validation team, you will be at the center of the embedded 5G/4G/multimode cellular firmware effort within a silicon design group responsible for crafting and productizing innovative cellular SoCs. This position requires someone comfortable with all aspects of RF Integration and validation, thrives in a multifaceted multi-functional organization, is not afraid to debate ideas openly, and is flexible enough to adjust to constantly evolving requirements!
description:
-  An integral part of the RF Integration and triage team, responsible for high-quality work track RF SW performance for every release.
-  Perform issue triage and debug for all RF functional issues
-  Automate and implement RF Test cases and log test results on Continuous Integration systems.
-  Specify, design, and develop Signaling mode Test coverage for all new features for R17 & R18 3GPP standard.
-  Collaborate with multiple Test teams, such as product tests and compliance tests to resolve optimal coverage and efficient delivery.
-  Work across various test systems from multiple TE vendors.
-  Work with multi-functional organization between Firmware, Cellular/ RF systems, and hardware designers to develop end-to-end feature test mechanisms.
key_qualifications:
BS and 10+ years of relevant industry experience.
Knowledge of mobile communications in 4G/5G 3GPP protocols and Physical layer & Radio Test aspects
Experience in RF Test metrics for a Cellular Modem and 3GPP RF Test case development in 2G/3G/4G/5G.
Experience in Test Automation and CI setup.
Excellent command of scripting languages such as Python.
The ability to triage and debug embedded software systems is a plus.
Knowledge of Communication theory, Wireless standards, Radio architecture, and Interfaces
education_experience: BS and 10+ years of relevant industry experience.
